channel.title: Gonarch Doesn't Fall Down Web
channel.description:
I was doing damage to the Gonarch when he stopped moving and shooting. All enemy AI ignored me and I was forced to restart. My guess is that the game isn't triggering the sequence when the Gonarch is supposed to fall down the web. This could be why the game doesn't progress. Footage: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=44zGyZQgYRk&feature=youtu.be
Map: bm_c4a2c Setpos: 2096.107422 -1359.200806 -1840.455444;setang 5.194069 -88.615623 -0.032467 (I'm not sure if the coordinates matter in order to do this glitch)

Xen Technical Beta Bugs :: Black Mesa General Discussions

Thread for bugs found in the technical beta ONLY. We are mostly interested in Xen, but if you find bugs in earthbound, we will fix those as well. Please post: -A detailed description of your issue -Your system specs -A screen shot

item.title: Gonarch Doesn't Fall Down Web
item.dc:creator: PatriotsFan50
item.description:
I was doing damage to the Gonarch when he stopped moving and shooting. All enemy AI ignored me and I was forced to restart. My guess is that the game isn’t triggering the sequence when the Gonarch is supposed to fall down the web. This could be why the game doesn’t progress.
